reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Support the Government of Madhya Pradesh to develop Indore and other cities through India's Smart Cities and Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation Programmes

description.narrative: Support the State Government of Madhya Pradesh develop investible and sustainable projects in smart technology, solid waste management and e-governance. The urban projects will, in turn, also create commercial opportunities for international businesses, including those from the UK.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
